title: The Phoenix Pareidolia:  But the most famous apparition of Jesus is the Shroud of Turin – a piece of 14th century linen
post:
Why no opponent of coins, letters, flowers etc. observed on the Shroud claims that the body image is nothing else but pareidolia? A random shape in the human form,  that everyone thinks represents real human (but it is nothing else but optical illusion). Just like other random shapes are claimed to be real  objects.
This was just an irony, of course.
author: O.K.
